abstract.t: As broadband access networks begin to mature, applications such asvideo-on-demand, application hosting and gaming are becoming viableservice offerings. In order to provide these types of service, it isnecessary to have extremely granular bandwidth control to ensurethat user session traffic has a highly predictable traffic deliveryprofile.The Personal Content Tunnel framework provides this control in asession-oriented subscriber-driven manner allowing the mostefficient use of access network bandwidth.
